mapper.insert: insert into free(f_no, f_title, f_content, f_photo, f_writer) values(seq_free.nextval, #{f_title}, #{f_content}, #{f_photo}, #{f_writer})
mapper.update: update free set f_title = #{f_title}, f_content = #{f_content}, f_photo = #{f_photo}, f_writer = #{f_writer}, f_udate = sysdate where f_no = #{f_no}
